  1. Career

Career at Mercura

We are always looking for new stars. If you have a towering level of ambition, we would love to hear from you, regardless of whether it is an internship, a student job or a full time position.

  • Full time: Software Developer

    Read More

    Are you passionate about software development and do you dream of running a business with lots of responsibility? If so, then Mercura is the place for you.

    Read More

  • Student job: Backend Developer

    Read More

    Are you passionate about software development and are you looking for an exciting and challenging student job with lots of responsibility and influence from the start? If so, then Mercura is the place for you.

    Read More

  • Student job: Backend Developer

    Read More

    If you love working with Front-End development and are an expert in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, then Mercura is the place for you.

    Read More

  • Internship: Business Development

    Read More

    If you are studying business and are looking for an internship, then Mercura is the place for you. Become part of a growing software company where there is plenty of responsibility from day one.

    Read More

  • Internship: UI/UX Designer

    Read More

    Do you love coming up with creative graphic solutions?

    Read More

  • Student job: Digital Designer

    Read More

    Get a student job at Mercura and gain practical experience with front-end design of our software solutions.

    Read More

At Mercura, we don't just create software – we foster a culture where innovation and teamwork drive our success. Here, your ideas are valued, and every day brings new opportunities to excel and make an impact.

CEO, Mercura ApS
